answerText: Simonides of Ceos [10] This other lyric poet, from Lesbos, wrote "a trembling / seizes all of me" in phainetai moi, and is also known for a Hymn to Aphrodite which asks the title goddess not to crush the author's spirit.
heading: VCU Closed  |2013 | Chicago B + Yale B | 21 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In The Republic, this man is the source of Polemarchus's definition of justice, and Socrates discusses his poetry in the Protagoras. For 10 points each, [10] Name this lyric poet, who was credited with inventing letters of the Greek alphabet and wrote many elegies and encomiums.
